name: Dungeon Drifter (TwinGhosts)
description:
DUNGEON DRIFTER [48 hour COMPO] by TwinGhosts

Ride through the dungeon and purge it from the invading forces with your trusty minecart.

Battle through numerous waves of enemies who will try to stop you at all cost!
Retry after losing to level Up and become stronger as your stats and abilities level with you.
Use your four abilities to stop the enemies in their tracks as you race past them to conquer the dungeon.

TOOLS:
- Unity
- Visual Studio 2017
- Photoshop
- Pyxel
- Guitar Pro 7

PLANNED FEATURES:
- Save/Load
- Classes to choose from
- Perk/Talents based on level
- Item Drops
- Boss Battles
- Multiple Stage
- Short Narrative
 
PERSONAL
